2164.subject: CART
2164.course_title_long: Charlie Don't Surf: War, Culture & Cinema
2164.descrlong: The course examines representations of armed conflict in cinema across different cultures. Fictionalized accounts of war, documentaries and satires are viewed and analyzed, examining social and psychological effects of armed conflict, attitudes toward nationalism and heroism, power structures, the morality of violence, and the ethical responsibilities of the individual.
